name: Roller Fruit: Splat Maze 3D
description:
Prepare your fruits and start your ride in our coaster puzzle simulator. You are in a maze 3D, and to escape it, you will have to make your brain work. Paint this maze with your fruit. Solve this puzzle and escape that maze 3D. Your fruit leaves a trail while splatting through the maze, so dive into this fruit vortex and solve every puzzle of our coaster simulator. Put this fruit on the roller and paint this maze 3D simulator in the colors of fruit vortex. Splat through the level and successfully complete every puzzle of our roller coaster in our maze 3D simulator: Roller Fruit: Splat Maze 3D.

In this maze 3D simulator, you are going to solve fruit puzzles. Let your roller fruit splat through the coaster. Paint the whole maze 3D to complete the level and dive into the next fruit vortex. Your fruit leaves a colorful trail while splatting through the coaster. So, paint every level of our maze 3D simulator to solve every puzzle of the game. You have various roller fruits like coconut, kiwifruit, watermelon, orange, and pitaya. So, dive into our fruit vortex to start solving the puzzles of this roller coaster maze 3D. Share this game with your friends and find out, who will paint every maze 3D faster. Splat through every coaster on your fruit roller to become the best in our puzzle simulator.

Roller Fruit: Splat Maze 3D is free to puzzle simulator. Splat through the coaster on your fruit roller to paint the whole maze 3D. Splat trough every level to solve the puzzles and dive into the fruit vortex. Splat around the obstacles and walls of our maze 3D to complete the fruit vortex puzzle. Can you paint every coaster of our maze 3D puzzle simulator without touching your paintings? Download our new simulator and splat on your roller through the fruit vortex maze to find the answer.
